title: Oscar Castellino
shortBiography: Oscar Castellino is an international baritone, composer of Mars Anthem 'Rise to Mars', and ensemble singer at the Royal Opera House. Born in a car on a busy Mumbai street with roots tracing to Goa, Oscar's journey from software engineer to opera singer began when Patricia Rozario discovered his talent during her concert tour of India.

pressQuotes.context: on Oscar's performance as James Meredith in Kommilitonen

pressQuotes.quote: Mesmerising as Meredith, has a commanding stage presence
Rising star in the operatic world

pressQuotes.context: on singing at Queen's Diamond Jubilee

education.scholarship: Christopher Ball Welsh National Opera Scholarship

upcomingEvents.event: LISBON CONCERT Oscar Castellino | Voz de Ópera de Goa
upcomingEvents.information:
ENGLISH: Join acclaimed baritone Oscar Castellino and pianist Rodrigo Ayala for a concert that unites the grandeur of opera with the soul of Goa. Enjoy a unique program of beloved lyrical arias and traditional Luso-Goan and Konkani songs, creating a musical bridge between two cultures united by history. From the stages of the Royal Opera House to the shores of the Arabian Sea, experience a voice that carries the lyric traditions of Europe and the heart of Goa.
PORTUGUÊS: Junte-se ao aclamado barítono Oscar Castellino e ao pianista Rodrigo Ayala para um espetáculo que une a grandiosidade da ópera à alma de Goa. Para ouvir, um programa singular de árias líricas bem conhecidas do público e canções tradicionais luso-goesas e Konkani, criando uma ponte musical entre duas culturas unidas pela história. Dos palcos da Royal Opera House às margens do Mar Arábico, viva a experiência de uma voz que transporta as tradições líricas da Europa e o coração de Goa.
upcomingEvents.address: Avenida Brasília, Doca de Alcântara (Norte) | 1350-352 Lisboa, Portugal
upcomingEvents.description:
ENGLISH: Oscar Castellino, baritone, and Rodrigo Ayala, piano.
Duration: 90 minutes with a 10-minute interval.
Audience: Ages 6 and up.
Capacity: 355 seats.
Price: €15 (discounts available).

PORTUGUÊS: Oscar Castellino, barítono, e Rodrigo Ayala, piano.
Duração: 90 minutos com intervalo de 10 minutos.
Público-alvo: M/6 anos.
Lotação: 355 lugares.
Preço: €15 (descontos em vigor).
program: Deh Vieni Alla Finestra, Don Giovanni | Mozart
Food is my Fantasy | Verdi, Kordo
Adeus Korcho Vellu Paulo | Torquato de Figueiredo
Jinnen Maka Sogle Dile | Sardessai, Castellino
upcomingEvents.contactInfo:
ENGLISH: For enquiries contact voice@oscarcastellino.com or info@foriente.pt.
PORTUGUÊS: Para informações contacte voice@oscarcastellino.com ou info@foriente.pt.

upcomingEvents.information: A Christmas celebration featuring Konkani and Goan-Portuguese carols, reviving old traditions. Details to be announced.
upcomingEvents.description: Following the huge success of Concerto de Natal 2025, Oscar Castellino returns to Goa for Christmas 2026 with another enchanting evening of Konkani and Goan-Portuguese carols. Stay tuned for more details.

upcomingEvents.event: DEC 14 Oscar Castellino and the Time Makers - A Goan Christmas Experience, Museum of Goa - Goa, India

upcomingEvents.information: Following the grand success of Goan Interactions 2025, the Baluji Music Foundation in collaboration with Melville Rodrigues and Oscar Castellino present an enchanting evening of timeless Goan Konkani and Portuguese tunes.
upcomingEvents.time:
5:30 pm Doors Open
6:00 pm Concert Starts
6:50 pm Interval / Refreshments available
7:25 pm Second Half
8:15 pm Concert Concludes / Meet the artists
upcomingEvents.description: Following the grand success of Goan Interactions 2025, the Baluji Music Foundation in collaboration with Melville Rodrigues and Oscar Castellino bring to you an enchanting evening of timeless Goan Konkani and Portuguese tunes, featuring baritone Oscar Castellino, sitar maestro Baluji Shrivastav OBE, vocalist Chelsea D'Silva, pianist Mark Troop and tabla maestro Yusuf Ali Khan. Celebrate Goa's unique European-Indian musical tapestry in a countryside-like London setting. Goan snacks available.
upcomingEvents.contactInfo: Goan snacks available. For enquiries contact voice@oscarcastellino.com

upcomingEvents.information: Konkani, Portuguese and Latin Carols. Goan Welfare Society and Baluji Music Foundation join hands to usher in the Christmas Spirit. Gorgeous music in a traditional Goan Style. Tickets include plate of snacks

I would love for you to attend a concert I am putting together in support of the Royal Foundation of St. Katharine. I have planned a gorgeous afternoon of music and food at this serene venue near Limehouse Station. The music will range from Opera to music from Musicals and Movies.

upcomingEvents.description:
The concert at 5 pm will feature blind guitarist Luis Mosquera showcasing a new piece by Zahra Palmer and she will perform it.
This will be followed by a classical section with Baritone Oscar Castellino, Soprano Daniella Sicari and Pianist Gavin Roberts.
